snippet: The Cardinals overcame a short outing by Tim Cooney in his major league debut to defeat the Philadelphia Phillies, 9-3, for their third straight win
abstract: Baseball Roundup; St Louis Cardinals beat Philadelphia Phillies, 9-3; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Cardinals overcame a short outing by Tim Cooney in his major league debut to defeat the Philadelphia Phillies, 9-3, for their third straight win

headline.main: Cardinals Trounce Phillies; Angels Hold Off the Athletics
